mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Harper, John; Magee, C. L.; Riddle, Samuel to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Harper, John; Magee, C. L.; Riddle, Samuel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 19 1861. By telegraph from Pittsburgh 19 1861. Capt WJ Koung[?] wanted to know how many of our home guards would volunteer to hold Parkersburg for thirty days in what conditions until the services of a regt be accepted for such a service & time you might depend upon a regiment in a few days if necessary Please answer [page 2] John Harper Saml Riddle CL Magee Members of Committee of Home Defense 56G177pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Harper, John; Magee, C. L.; Riddle, Samuel
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
